message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you that this product is worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm confident it holds even greater potential for you. I'm willing to let you acquire it for a price that reflects its value and your potential. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
